item.title: Programming Tutorials
item.description: Welcome back! You have probably arrived here after grokking my ten-episode free Lua programming tutorials on Quora. If so, while I am writing the rest of the Lua tutorials, I have something for you in the meantime.(If not, then I suggest you head to my Lua tutorial space on Quora and grok it before coming back here.) As a future programmer, it is imperative that you know at least one Lisp dialect so as to take that knowledge and delve deeper into the wonderful world of functional programming.

item.title: 1. With the Name of Allah, The Most Exalted
item.description: Greetings and regards, Hoping to put together my various introspections, ideas, and observations, in short, all of my writings in one place, I begin this site. I write here once a week. You can use RSS to stay informed, or simply bookmark this site and visit once a week. I shall not add you to an annoying mailing list and pester you with reminders. All the best, Jan

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I am Jan Meww. I am just a regular person who loves thinking, reading, and solving problems. I am on Quora. Also on Youtube. If you want to write to me or otherwise get in touch, here is my Twitter.
